summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of surplus City Light property; declaring property known as Fremont Substation, located at 3622 Albion Place North in Seattle, Washington, surplus to the City's needs and not required for providing continued municipal utility services; authorizing the sale of such property for $337,500 to Capitol Hill Housing Improvement Program, a Washington public corporation; authorizing the execution of sale documents; and directing the deposit of proceeds to the Light Fund.
